name: Roll20, Token Macro Bar, colorize
description: Modifies: Token Macro Bar. Changes the colors of the 1st 4 buttons.

user.name: xBladeRunner
user.about: I play Savage Worlds on Roll20 and (maybe soon) AstralTableTop. I love to fix things, so if you have a problem with one of my styles or a suggestion, let me know.

additional_info: You can easily extend this to color more buttons and choose your own colors. It colors buttons based on the position, not the function, so whatever button is 1st will be purple. If you add a button in front of that, then the new button will be purple.
